document.full_text: dwyane wade and lebron james scored all but 4 of miami's 26 points in the fourth quarter and combined for 17 points in a 19-4 run to finish the game.
document.title: playoffs | heat 83, bulls 80: heat gains finals as stars rally late
lines_and_colors: dwyane wade and lebron james scored all but 4 of miami's 26 points in the fourth quarter and combined for 17 points in a 19-4 run to finish the game.
